verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: And hearkens to its Lord, as it must.
verse.verse_3: And when the earth is leveled out.
verse.verse_4: And casts out what is in it, and becomes empty.
verse.verse_5: And hearkens to its Lord, as it must.
verse.verse_6: O man! You are laboring towards your Lord, and you will meet Him.
verse.verse_7: As for him who is given his book in his right hand.
verse.verse_8: He will have an easy settlement.
verse.verse_9: And will return to his family delighted.
verse.verse_10: But as for him who is given his book behind his back.
verse.verse_13: He used to be happy among his family.
verse.verse_14: He thought he would never return.
verse.verse_15: In fact, his Lord was watching him.
verse.verse_17: And by the night, and what it covers.
verse.verse_18: And by the moon, as it grows full.
verse.verse_19: You will mount stage by stage.
verse.verse_20: What is the matter with them that they do not believe?
verse.verse_21: And when the Quran is read to them, they do not bow down?
verse.verse_22: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.
verse.verse_23: But God knows what they hide inside.
verse.verse_24: So inform them of a painful punishment.
verse.verse_25: Except those who believe and do good deeds; they will have an undiminished reward.
